users
Class User

java.lang.Object
  users.User

public class User
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a user of the Scheduling System.
Invariants:

  • name != null
  • user name != null
  • password != null

Constructor Detail

User

public User(java.lang.String the_name,
            java.lang.String the_password,
            StudentPreferences the_stud_prefs,
            InstructorPreferences the_inst_prefs,
            AdvisorPreferences the_adv_prefs,
            boolean the_scheduler)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a unique user of the scheduling system.

Parameters:
the_name - The user's name
the_password - The user's system password
the_stud_prefs - The user's student status (T/F)
the_inst_prefs - The user's instructor status (T/F)
the_adv_prefs - The user's advisor status (T/F)
the_scheduler - The user's scheduler status (T/F)
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name, user name, or password == null

getStudentFeedback

public java.util.Collection<StudentFeedbackSummary> getStudentFeedback(Schedule the_schedule,
                                                                       java.util.Collection<DaySlot> the_dayslot_collection)
Gets day and time feedback from a student regarding when he can be on campus for the courses he wants to take.
Preconditions:
  • the schedule of courses is not null
  • a collection of dayslots (MW, TR, etc) when courses are offered is not null
Postconditions:
  • the returned feedback collection is not null

Parameters:
the_schedule - A schedule of courses
the_dayslot_collection - The collection of dayslots
Returns:
The feedback collection of days and times

getAdvisorFeedback

public AdvisorFeedback getAdvisorFeedback(Schedule the_schedule)
Returns a collection of sections the advisor wants on the schedule that it does not presently have.
Preconditions:
  • the schedule is not null
Postconditions:
  • none

Parameters:
the_schedule - The schedule of courses
Returns:
A collection of missing sections

getInstructorFeedback

public InstructorFeedback getInstructorFeedback(Schedule the_schedule)
This method compares every course/day/time assigned to this instructor with the courses/days/times he wants to teach.
Preconditions:
  • the schedule != null
Postconditions:
  • does not return null

Parameters:
the_schedule - The schedule of courses
Returns:
an object which collection of unwanted sections.
